title: How can you check what skins do you own
body: its a bit hard to remember all the skins you bought, is there a way to check skin stats, like how many skins do you own in total, what skins do you own for each of the champion

replies.body:
Hey there kingswenxa, 

There's not really a easy way of doing it. But the ways I know that exist at the moment in regards to knowing what skins you own are as follows:

* Going into your own profile | champion tab | click on the champion you want to check what skins for a scroll through (this method doesn't always work as I've noticed a bug occasionally where it says unowned, not purchasable etc.)
* Go into the shop tab | purchase history (this isn't the best way as it only displays purchases within the last 90 days)
* Go into the shop tab | sub section skins | un-tick the box "Not Owned" and it should show all the skins available for the champions that you own. Skins you own will show up with a green overlay saying "OWNED". 

Regards,
Fog
